What about the Romans then? Gave us roads, indoor plumbing and many others. They fed prisoners to lions, made them fought each other for entertainment. Yet it's alright to mention that.

No matter. I'll stick to Physics and calculus, leave politics to those who know it.

topics.body: Christ I hate windows; if you're wondering what I mean by this is that I have a valid windows 7 key, but windows is being stupid and claiming that it's not valid because the key is for 7.1 not 7 and thus I'm having to completely purge the windows partition, bleachbit it and then reinstall windows cause of how much it's a pain in the arse.  I'm so glad I don't have windows 8 cause chances are this shit would be even more of a pain in the ass.
